name: Mexican Christmas Apple Salad
description: Mexican Christmas Apple Salad, crisp apples, pineapple, grapes, and chopped pecans are mixed with a sweet almond crema.
recipeIngredient: 3 cups Diced gala apples ((you can peel or not peel according to preference))

recipeInstructions.text: Bring 1 pint of water to a boil in a small sauce pot and pour over the almonds. Let soak overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring 1 pint of water to a boil in a small sauce pot and pour over the almonds. Let soak overnight.

recipeInstructions.text: The following day peel the almonds by pressing an almond between your thumb and forefinger and pressing lightly. The skin should just pop off.
recipeInstructions.name: The following day peel the almonds by pressing an almond between your thumb and forefinger and pressing lightly. The skin should just pop off.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, place the almonds, almond milk, lemon juice, and maple syrup and blend at high speed until completely smooth and cream like (to get a super smooth sauce you will need a high powered blender).
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, place the almonds, almond milk, lemon juice, and maple syrup and blend at high speed until completely smooth and cream like (to get a super smooth sauce you will need a high powered blender).

recipeInstructions.text: Place sauce in a small container and refrigerate for 30 min.
recipeInstructions.name: Place sauce in a small container and refrigerate for 30 min.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine the apples, pineapple, grapes, and chopped pecans. Pour sauce over it and mix well.
